steps.conclusion: The first suggestion title violates the no-levels rule: "Programação para Iniciantes" includes a level indicator ("Iniciantes" / Beginners). Titles must avoid words like Beginner/Advanced/Intro. Consequently, its english_title "Programming for Beginners" mirrors the invalid structure. Other suggestions comply with rules (Portuguese titles, <=5 words, single-topic, correct english_title, is_language_course=false, icons with tabler- prefix).
None. Language is Portuguese for titles/descriptions, english_title translations are appropriate, icons have correct prefix, and all titles are <=5 words without joiners.
Replace "Programação para Iniciantes" with "Programação" to satisfy the no-levels rule. Optionally add another canonical option like "Engenharia de Software". Keep other elements as-is.
